Class Corpse

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Item
game.Corpse
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, ItemInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
AllosaurCorpse, BrachiosaurCorpse, StegosaurCorpse
public abstract class Corpse
extends Item
Abstract class for implementing methods like getting time that corpse has been on ground and within every turn decrease it
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Cheng Zi Ming
